sentence.text: Individual 5 is the mother of individual 4.
She had congenital unilateral vocal cord paralysis, short stature (147.5 cm), small HC (< 3rd) ptosis, subaortic ventricular septal defect, myopia, and hypotonia.
Prior to the exome which identified the POLR1A variant in herself and her son (individual 4), she had a normal karyotype and subtelomeric fluorescent in situ hybridization.
